item.title: [601/602]Emotes
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

Difficulty: 4/10 <-- You gotta know all this shit
Tested on: HotYutes 601Server with 602 Cache

Ok. Simple enough? Should be a snippet.

go into
src >> com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players >> ipackets >> InterfaceClicked.java

Once there find

package com.hotyute.clientdata.players.ipackets;

and UNDER it add

import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.content.scEmotes;

now go find

if (packetId == 41) { switch (interfaceId) {

and add this.

[code] case 464: // Emotes tab
switch (buttonId) {
case 47: // Easter event… around the world in eggty days
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“11542”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“2037”), 0);
break;
case 46: // Turkey day emote.
player.turkeyEmote = 28;
break;
case 45: // Ice melting emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“11044”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1973”), 0);
break;
case 44: // Trick emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“10530”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1864”), 0);
break;
case 43: // Explore Emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“9990”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1734”), 0);
break;
case 42: // Safety First Emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“8770”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1553”), 0);
break;
case 41: // Air Guitar
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“2414”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1537”), 0);
break;
case 40: // Snowman Dance
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“7531”), 0);
break;
case 39: // SkillCape Emotes
scEmotes.initiate(player);
break;
case 38: // Bunny Hop
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“6111”), 0);
break;
case 37: // Scared Emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“2836”), 0);
break;
case 36: // Zombie Hand Emote
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“7272”), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(“1244”), 0);
break;

        case 22: // clap emote
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("865"), 0);
        break;
          
        case 18: // Cry
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("860"), 0);
        break;
        
        case 16: // Bow
                    DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("10301"), 0);
                    break;
        
        case 14: // dance emote..
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("866"), 0);
        break;
        
        case 10: // beckon emote
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("864"), 0);
        break;
        
        case 9: // Cheer
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("862"), 0);
        break;
        
        case 7: // Wave
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("863"), 0);
        break;
        
        case 5: // Angry
        DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("859"), 0);// Possibly "861" too?
        break;
        case 4: // Bow
                    DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("858"), 0);
                    break;

        case 2: // Yes
                    DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort("855"), 0);
                    break;
        }
        break;[/code]

then go down some more and find

                            player.getEquipment().set(itemSlot, new int[]{itemId, 1});

and ABOVE it add

player.wearing[itemSlot] = itemId;

now go into
src >> com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players
and make the folder called content

now make a file called scEmotes.java and place this into it.

[code]package com.hotyute.clientdata.players.content;

import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.;
import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.ipackets.;
import com.hotyute.communications.;
import com.hotyute.communications.sqlprotocol.;
import com.hotyute.staticdata.;
import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.update.masks.;
import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.skills.*;

public class scEmotes {
/**

  • Handles the SkillCape Emotes. Links to the interfaceclicked packet
  • to do skillcape emotes. Good Luck me!
  • <lucascarpenter>
  • @param Player
    **/
    public static void initiate(Player player) {
    try {
    int skill = -1, skillcapeAnimation = -1, skillcapeGraphic = -1;
    String type = ItemInfo.getEquipmentType(1);
    int capeID = DataDecoder.slotDecode(type);//Constants.EQUIPSLOTORDER[11];

int capes = player.wearing[1];
if(capes == -1) {//player.getEquipment().get(capes) == -1) {
ActionSender.sendMessage(player, “You aren’t even wearing a cape! Get a SkillCape first!”, null, 0);
return;
}
switch (capes) {//player.getEquipment().get(capes)) {
/*
* Dungeoneering cape.
/
case 18509:
case 18508:
skill = 24;
player.dEmote = 28;
break;
/
* Attack cape.
/
case 9747:
case 9748:
skill = 0;
skillcapeAnimation = 4959;
skillcapeGraphic = 823;
break;
/
* Defense cape.
/
case 9753:
case 9754:
skill = 1;
skillcapeAnimation = 4961;
skillcapeGraphic = 824;
break;
/
* Strength cape.
/
case 9750:
case 9751:
skill = 2;
skillcapeAnimation = 4981;
skillcapeGraphic = 828;
break;
/
* Hitpoints cape.
/
case 9768:
case 9769:
skill = 3;
skillcapeAnimation = 4971;
skillcapeGraphic = 833;
break;
/
* Ranging cape.
/
case 9756:
case 9757:
skill = 4;
skillcapeAnimation = 4973;
skillcapeGraphic = 832;
break;
/
* Prayer cape.
/
case 9759:
case 9760:
skill = 5;
skillcapeAnimation = 4979;
skillcapeGraphic = 829;
break;
/
* Magic cape.
/
case 9762:
case 9763:
skill = 6;
skillcapeAnimation = 4939;
skillcapeGraphic = 813;
break;
/
* Cooking cape.
/
case 9801:
case 9802:
skill = 7;
skillcapeAnimation = 4955;
skillcapeGraphic = 821;
break;
/
* Woodcutting cape.
/
case 9807:
case 9808:
skill = 8;
skillcapeAnimation = 4957;
skillcapeGraphic = 822;
break;
/
* Fletching cape.
/
case 9783:
case 9784:
skill = 9;
skillcapeAnimation = 4937;
skillcapeGraphic = 812;
break;
/
* Fishing cape.
/
case 9798:
case 9799:
skill = 10;
skillcapeAnimation = 4951;
skillcapeGraphic = 819;
break;
/
* Firemaking cape.
/
case 9804:
case 9805:
skill = 11;
skillcapeAnimation = 4975;
skillcapeGraphic = 831;
break;
/
* Crafting cape.
/
case 9780:
case 9781:
skill = 12;
skillcapeAnimation = 4949;
skillcapeGraphic = 818;
break;
/
* Smithing cape.
/
case 9795:
case 9796:
skill = 13;
skillcapeAnimation = 4943;
skillcapeGraphic = 815;
break;
/
* Mining cape.
/
case 9792:
case 9793:
skill = 14;
skillcapeAnimation = 4941;
skillcapeGraphic = 814;
break;
/
* Herblore cape.
/
case 9774:
case 9775:
skill = 15;
skillcapeAnimation = 4969;
skillcapeGraphic = 835;
break;
/
* Agility cape.
/
case 9771:
case 9772:
skill = 16;
skillcapeAnimation = 4977;
skillcapeGraphic = 830;
break;
/
* Thieving cape.
/
case 9777:
case 9778:
skill = 17;
skillcapeAnimation = 4965;
skillcapeGraphic = 826;
break;
/
* Slayer cape.
/
case 9786:
case 9787:
skill = 18;
skillcapeAnimation = 4967;
skillcapeGraphic = 1656;
break;
/
* Farming cape.
/
case 9810:
case 9811:
skill = 19;
skillcapeAnimation = 4963;
skillcapeGraphic = 825;
break;
/
* Runecraft cape.
/
case 9765:
case 9766:
skill = 20;
skillcapeAnimation = 4947;
skillcapeGraphic = 817;
break;
/
* Hunter’s cape
/
case 9948:
case 9949:
skill = 21;
skillcapeAnimation = 5158;
skillcapeGraphic = 907;
break;
/
* Construct. cape.
/
case 9789:
case 9790:
skill = 22;
skillcapeAnimation = 4953;
skillcapeGraphic = 820;
break;
/
* Summoning cape.
/
case 12169:
case 12170:
skill = 23;
skillcapeAnimation = 8525;
skillcapeGraphic = 1515;
break;
/
* Quest cape.
*/
case 9813:
skillcapeAnimation = 4945;
skillcapeGraphic = 816;
break;
default:
ActionSender.sendMessage(player, “You need to be wearing a skillcape to do the skillcape emote.”, null, 0);
break;
}
if(skill == -1 || SkillCalc.getLevelForXP(player, skill) == 99) {
DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(""+skillcapeAnimation), 0);
DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(player, Short.parseShort(""+skillcapeGraphic), 0);
} else {
ActionSender.sendMessage(player, “You need to have the level 99 in your skillcape’s skill to do this emote.”, null, 0);
}
} catch(Exception exc) {}
}

}[/code]

now go into
src >> com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players >> Player.java

now under

public class Player extends Entity {

add this…

public int[] wearing = new int[15]; public int dEmote = -1; public int turkeyEmote = -1;

then somewhere in the Player.java file make this void.

/** The Basic Processor. * Works good.. works nicely.. * Testing this as it goes.. * Not very stable. :( **/ public void process() { if (turkeyEmote == 28) { DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(this, Short.parseShort("10994"), 0); } if (turkeyEmote == 26) { DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(this, Short.parseShort("10996"), 0); getAppearance().setNPCType(8499); getAppearance().isNPC = true; DataCollect.applyVisualUpdate(this); } if (turkeyEmote == 14) { DataCollect.applyAnimationUpdate(this, Short.parseShort("10995"), 0); DataCollect.applyGraphicsUpdate(this, Short.parseShort("1714"), 0); getAppearance().setNPCType(-1); getAppearance().isNPC = false; DataCollect.applyVisualUpdate(this); turkeyEmote = -1; } if(turkeyEmote > 0){ turkeyEmote--; } }

now go into
src >> com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players >> AppearanceVals.java
and under

public class AppearanceVals {

add

public boolean isNPC = false;

now go to
com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players >> update >> PlayerCycle.java
and find

                for (Player player : DataStorage.players) {

now under that add

player.process();

then go to
src >> com >> hotyute >> clientdata >> players >> update >> masks >> AppearanceModel.java

and replace the WHOLE FILE, with this.

[code]package com.hotyute.clientdata.players.update.masks;

import com.hotyute.clientdata.players.Player;
import com.hotyute.communications.OutStream;
import com.hotyute.communications.sqlprotocol.ItemInfo;
import com.hotyute.staticdata.DataStorage;

/**

  • Created by IntelliJ IDEA.

  • User: Samuel hotyute_mason@hotmail.com

  • Date: Jan 31, 2010

  • Time: 10:56:25 AM
    */
    public class AppearanceModel {
    public static void apply(Player player, OutStream outStream, String name) {
    OutStream playerapp = new OutStream(256);
    playerapp.setOffset(0);
    playerapp.addByte(player.getAppearance().getGender());
    if ((player.getAppearance().getGender() & 0x2) == 2) {
    playerapp.addByte(0);
    playerapp.addByte(0);
    }
    playerapp.addByte(player.getAppearance().getMobRank())
    .addByte(player.getAppearance().getPKIcon())
    .addByte(player.getAppearance().getPrayerIcon());
    if(!player.getAppearance().isNPC) {
    //Experimental…
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
    if (player.getEquipment().get(i)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(i)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(i)[0]));
    else playerapp.addByte(0);
    }
    if (player.getEquipment().get(4)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(4)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(4)[0]));
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[2]);
    if (player.getEquipment().get(5)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(5)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(5)[0]));
    else playerapp.addByte(0);
    if (ItemInfo.getEquipmentType(player.getEquipment().get(4)[0]).equals(“FULLCHEST”))
    playerapp.addByte(0);
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[3]);
    if (player.getEquipment().get(7)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(7)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(7)[0]));
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[5]);
    if (ItemInfo.getEquipmentType(player.getEquipment().get(0)[0]).equals(“FULLHAT”) && ItemInfo.getEquipmentType(player.getEquipment().get(0)[0]).equals(“FULLMASK”))
    playerapp.addByte(0);
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[0]);
    if (player.getEquipment().get(9)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(9)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(9)[0]));
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[4]);
    if (player.getEquipment().get(10)[0] != -1 && DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(10)[0]) != null)
    playerapp.addShort(0x8000 + DataStorage.EQUIPIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(10)[0]));
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[6]);
    if (ItemInfo.getEquipmentType(player.getEquipment().get(0)[0]).equals(“FULLMASK”))
    playerapp.addByte(0);
    else playerapp.addShort(0x100 + player.getAppearance().getLook()[1]);

     //experimental?
             	} else if(player.getAppearance().isNPC) {
            playerapp.addShort(-1);
     playerapp.addShort(player.getAppearance().getNPCType());
     playerapp.addByte((byte) 0);

    }
    for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++)
    playerapp.addByte(player.getAppearance().getColors()[j]);
    if (DataStorage.RENDERIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(3)[0]) != null) {
    playerapp.addShort(DataStorage.RENDERIDS.get((short) player.getEquipment().get(3)[0]));
    } else playerapp.addShort(1426);
    playerapp.addString(name).addByte(138)
    .addShort(0)
    .addShort(0);
    outStream.addByte(playerapp.getOffset());
    for (int i = 0; i < playerapp.getOffset(); i++)
    outStream.addByte(playerapp.getBuffer()[i]);
    }

}[/code]

ok. i think thats all? questions, comments, post em.

Read full topic
